name: affirm-payment
title: Affirm Payment
description: An implentation of Affirm payment method

enableKatapult.title: Enable Katapult
enableKatapult.description: Set to true if you wish to enable Katapult leasing option

companyName.title: Company Name (optional)
companyName.description: If you have multiple sites operating under a single Affirm account, you can override the external company/brand name that the customer sees. This affects all references to your company name in the Affirm UI. Leave blank to use your default company name stored in your Affirm account.

publicApiKey.title: Public API Key for promotional components
publicApiKey.description: The public API key for your Affirm account

isLive.title: Production Mode for promotional components
isLive.description: Set to true for production mode, false for sandbox mode. Does NOT affect Affirm checkout - use payment gateway setting to change checkout mode.

delayInterval.title: Interval to use for the following three settings

delayToAutoSettle.title: Delay to auto-settle
delayToAutoSettle.description: Number of minutes/hours/days before authorized Affirm payments are automatically settled

delayToAutoSettleAfterAntifraud.title: Delay to auto-settle after anti-fraud
delayToAutoSettleAfterAntifraud.description: Number of minutes/hours/days before authorized Affirm payments are automatically settled after merchant's antifraud approval

delayToCancel.title: Delay to cancel
delayToCancel.description: Number of minutes/hours/days before Affirm payments are automatically canceled

katapultPublicToken.title: Katapult public token (optional)
katapultPublicToken.description: The public API token for your Katapult account

katapultPrivateToken.title: Katapult private token (optional)
katapultPrivateToken.description: The private API token for your Katapult account
